sodium.options.attack_indicator_max_valu: Controls where the Attack Indicator stops being displayed on screen.
sodium.options.attack_indicator_min_valu: Controls where the Attack Indicator begins to be displayed on screen.
sodium.options.augmented_arm_height.tool: Controls how the arm height is impacted by attack cooldown.
sodium.options.dual_attack_indicator.too: Controls how the Dual Attack Indicators are displayed on screen.
sodium.options.projectile_charge_indicat: Controls where the Projectile Charge Indicator is displayed on screen.
sodium.options.shield_indicator.tooltip: Controls where the Shield Indicator is displayed on screen.
